etymologies: modern Latin, from Greek nemesion, denoting various similar plants

definitions: a plant related to the snapdragon that is cultivated for its colorful, obliquely funnel-shaped flowers.

notes.text: Genus Nemesia, family Scrophulariaceae: several species, in particular N. strumosa and its hybrids

shortDefinitions: plant related to snapdragon, which is cultivated for its colourful funnel-shaped flowers
